text: StoryBots is an American children's educational media franchise. It is best known for the Netflix series Ask the StoryBots. The StoryBots library includes educational TV shows, books, videos, and music designed to make foundational learning fun and encourage intellectual curiosity in children ages 3-to-8. == References == == Other websites == * * JibJab website Category:Netflix Category:Media franchises Category:2012 establishments
title: StoryBots
